parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

functionDecorators.name: _setBorrowCapGuardian
functionDecorators.description: Admin function to change the Borrow Cap Guardian.

parameterDecorators.name: newBorrowCapGuardian
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new Borrow Cap Guardian.

functionDecorators.name: _setCloseFactor
functionDecorators.description: Sets the closeFactor used when liquidating borrows. Admin function to set closeFactor.

parameterDecorators.name: newCloseFactorMantissa
parameterDecorators.description: New close factor, scaled by 1e18.

functionDecorators.name: _setCollateralFactor
functionDecorators.description: Sets the collateralFactor for a market. Admin function to set per-market collateralFactor.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: The market to set the factor on.

parameterDecorators.name: newCollateralFactorMantissa
parameterDecorators.description: The new collateral factor, scaled by 1e18.

functionDecorators.name: _setLiquidationIncentive
functionDecorators.description: Sets liquidationIncentive. Admin function to set liquidationIncentive.

parameterDecorators.name: newLiquidationIncentiveMantissa
parameterDecorators.description: New liquidationIncentive scaled by 1e18.

functionDecorators.name: _setMarketBorrowCaps
functionDecorators.description: Set the given borrow caps for the given vToken markets. Borrowing that brings total borrows to or above borrow cap will revert. Admin or borrowCapGuardian function to set the borrow caps. A borrow cap of 0 corresponds to unlimited borrowing.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the markets (tokens) to change the borrow caps for.

parameterDecorators.name: newBorrowCaps
parameterDecorators.description: The new borrow cap values in underlying to be set. A value of 0 corresponds to unlimited borrowing.

functionDecorators.name: _setMaxAssets
functionDecorators.description: Sets maxAssets which controls how many markets can be entered. Admin function to set maxAssets.

parameterDecorators.name: newMaxAssets
parameterDecorators.description: New max assets.

functionDecorators.name: _setPriceOracle
functionDecorators.description: Sets a new price oracle for the comptroller. Admin function to set a new price oracle.

functionDecorators.name: _setProtocolPaused
functionDecorators.description: Set whole protocol pause/unpause state.

functionDecorators.name: _setVAIController
functionDecorators.description: Sets a new VAI controller. Admin function to set a new VAI controller.

functionDecorators.name: _setVAIVaultInfo
functionDecorators.description: Set the VAI Vault infos.

parameterDecorators.name: vault_
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the VAI Vault.

parameterDecorators.name: releaseStartBlock_
parameterDecorators.description: The start block of release to VAI Vault.

parameterDecorators.name: minReleaseAmount_
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum release amount to VAI Vault.

functionDecorators.name: _setVenusSpeed
functionDecorators.description: Set XVS speed for a single market.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: The market whose XVS speed to update.

parameterDecorators.name: venusSpeed
parameterDecorators.description: New XVS speed for market.

functionDecorators.name: _setVenusVAIRate
functionDecorators.description: Set the amount of XVS distributed per block to VAI Mint.

parameterDecorators.name: venusVAIRate_
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of XVS wei per block to distribute to VAI Mint.

functionDecorators.name: _setVenusVAIVaultRate
functionDecorators.description: Set the amount of XVS distributed per block to VAI Vault.

parameterDecorators.name: venusVAIVaultRate_
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of XVS wei per block to distribute to VAI Vault.

functionDecorators.name: _supportMarket
functionDecorators.description: Add the market to the markets mapping and set it as listed. Admin function to set isListed and add support for the market.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the market (token) to list.

functionDecorators.name: borrowAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Checks if the account should be allowed to borrow the underlying asset of the given market.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: The market to verify the borrow against.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The account which would borrow the asset.

parameterDecorators.name: borrowAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of underlying the account would borrow.

functionDecorators.name: borrowVerify
functionDecorators.description: Validates borrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: Asset whose underlying is being borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address borrowing the underlying.

parameterDecorators.name: borrowAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the underlying asset requested to borrow.

functionDecorators.name: checkMembership
functionDecorators.description: Returns whether the given account is entered in the given asset.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the account to check.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: The vToken to check.

functionDecorators.name: claimVenus
functionDecorators.description: Claim all the xvs accrued by holder in the specified markets.

parameterDecorators.name: holder
parameterDecorators.description: The address to claim XVS for.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The list of markets to claim XVS in.

functionDecorators.name: claimVenus
functionDecorators.description: Claim all the xvs accrued by holder in all markets and VAI.

parameterDecorators.name: holder
parameterDecorators.description: The address to claim XVS for.

functionDecorators.name: claimVenus
functionDecorators.description: Claim all xvs accrued by the holders.

parameterDecorators.name: holders
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses to claim XVS for.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The list of markets to claim XVS in.

parameterDecorators.name: borrowers
parameterDecorators.description: Whether or not to claim XVS earned by borrowing.

parameterDecorators.name: suppliers
parameterDecorators.description: Whether or not to claim XVS earned by supplying.

functionDecorators.name: distributeVAIMinterVenus
functionDecorators.description: Calculate XVS accrued by a VAI minter and possibly transfer it to them. VAI minters will not begin to accrue until after the first interaction with the protocol.

parameterDecorators.name: vaiMinter
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the VAI minter to distribute XVS to.

functionDecorators.name: enterMarkets
functionDecorators.description: Add assets to be included in account liquidity calculation.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The list of addresses of the vToken markets to be enabled.

functionDecorators.name: exitMarket
functionDecorators.description: Removes asset from sender's account liquidity calculation. Sender must not have an outstanding borrow balance in the asset, or be providing necessary collateral for an outstanding borrow.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the asset to be removed.

functionDecorators.name: getAccountLiquidity
functionDecorators.description: Determine the current account liquidity wrt collateral requirements.

functionDecorators.name: getAllMarkets
functionDecorators.description: Return all of the markets. The automatic getter may be used to access an individual market.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetsIn
functionDecorators.description: Returns the assets an account has entered.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the account to pull assets for.

functionDecorators.name: getHypotheticalAccountLiquidity
functionDecorators.description: Determine what the account liquidity would be if the given amounts were redeemed/borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The account to determine liquidity for.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenModify
parameterDecorators.description: The market to hypothetically redeem/borrow in.

parameterDecorators.name: redeemTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The number of tokens to hypothetically redeem.

parameterDecorators.name: borrowAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of underlying to hypothetically borrow.

functionDecorators.name: getXVSAddress
functionDecorators.description: Return the address of the XVS token.

functionDecorators.name: liquidateBorrowAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Checks if the liquidation should be allowed to occur.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenBorrowed
parameterDecorators.description: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenCollateral
parameterDecorators.description: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidator
parameterDecorators.description: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: repayAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of underlying being repaid.

functionDecorators.name: liquidateBorrowVerify
functionDecorators.description: Validates liquidateBorrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenBorrowed
parameterDecorators.description: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenCollateral
parameterDecorators.description: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidator
parameterDecorators.description: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: actualRepayAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of underlying being repaid.

functionDecorators.name: liquidateCalculateSeizeTokens
functionDecorators.description: Calculate number of tokens of collateral asset to seize given an underlying amount. Used in liquidation (called in vToken.liquidateBorrowFresh).

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenBorrowed
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrowed vToken.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenCollateral
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the collateral vToken.

parameterDecorators.name: actualRepayAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of vTokenBorrowed underlying to convert into vTokenCollateral tokens.

functionDecorators.name: mintAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Checks if the account should be allowed to mint tokens in the given market.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: The market to verify the mint against.

parameterDecorators.name: minter
parameterDecorators.description: The account which would get the minted tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: mintAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of underlying being supplied to the market in exchange for tokens.

functionDecorators.name: mintVerify
functionDecorators.description: Validates mint and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: Asset being minted.

parameterDecorators.name: minter
parameterDecorators.description: The address minting the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: actualMintAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the underlying asset being minted.

parameterDecorators.name: mintTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The number of tokens being minted.

functionDecorators.name: redeemAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Checks if the account should be allowed to redeem tokens in the given market.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: The market to verify the redeem against.

parameterDecorators.name: redeemer
parameterDecorators.description: The account which would redeem the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: redeemTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The number of vTokens to exchange for the underlying asset in the market.

functionDecorators.name: redeemVerify
functionDecorators.description: Validates redeem and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: Asset being redeemed.

parameterDecorators.name: redeemer
parameterDecorators.description: The address redeeming the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: redeemAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the underlying asset being redeemed.

parameterDecorators.name: redeemTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The number of tokens being redeemed.

functionDecorators.name: releaseToVault
functionDecorators.description: Transfer XVS to VAI Vault.

functionDecorators.name: repayBorrowAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Checks if the account should be allowed to repay a borrow in the given market.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: The market to verify the repay against.

parameterDecorators.name: payer
parameterDecorators.description: The account which would repay the asset.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The account which would repay the asset.

parameterDecorators.name: repayAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the underlying asset the account would repay.

functionDecorators.name: repayBorrowVerify
functionDecorators.description: Validates repayBorrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: Asset being repaid.

parameterDecorators.name: payer
parameterDecorators.description: The address repaying the borrow.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: actualRepayAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of underlying being repaid.

functionDecorators.name: seizeAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Checks if the seizing of assets should be allowed to occur.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenCollateral
parameterDecorators.description: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenBorrowed
parameterDecorators.description: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidator
parameterDecorators.description: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: seizeTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The number of collateral tokens to seize.

functionDecorators.name: seizeVerify
functionDecorators.description: Validates seize and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenCollateral
parameterDecorators.description: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized.

parameterDecorators.name: vTokenBorrowed
parameterDecorators.description: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidator
parameterDecorators.description: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: seizeTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The number of collateral tokens to seize.

functionDecorators.name: setMintedVAIOf
functionDecorators.description: Set the minted VAI amount of the `owner`.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the account to set.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of VAI to set to the account.

functionDecorators.name: transferAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Checks if the account should be allowed to transfer tokens in the given market.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: The market to verify the transfer against.

parameterDecorators.name: src
parameterDecorators.description: The account which sources the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: dst
parameterDecorators.description: The account which receives the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: transferTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The number of vTokens to transfer.

functionDecorators.name: transferVerify
functionDecorators.description: Validates transfer and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

parameterDecorators.name: vToken
parameterDecorators.description: Asset being transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: src
parameterDecorators.description: The account which sources the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: dst
parameterDecorators.description: The account which receives the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: transferTokens
parameterDecorators.description: The number of vTokens to transfer.
